title: peN Ashai marandu
sahitya:
peN Ashai marandu nAn unnAshaiyuDan vAzhap-piriyam koNDEn paranE shubhakaranE


anupallavi

  AnnAmalaiyil mEvum aruT-perum jyOtiyE anbarukk-upashAntam aLikkum dayAnidhiyE


caraNam    sElaip-paghaTTinilum shempon minukkinilum cittam viTTalaiyAmal bhakti vairAgyamuDan
mAlai mallikai pOl un maNamAlaiyAgiyE mAshaTru vAzha sheida sUTra yOgiyE
